author: Phil
content:
Graying out countries is nothing new. Even or own NOAA weather refuses to show us what’s coming down from Canada, at least around the great lakes.

Graying out, no, they just don’t show it.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
Just one ship? Last time I checked the Spanish coastline has a big gap in the middle, a country called Portugal – which it seems Spain refuses to accept the existance of as it was greyed out on the map of the Iberian peninsula in the Spanish TV weather forecast I saw a few years ago.
They will however be one ship ahead of the UK which has to charter two commercial vessels to be on stand-by for incidents, and politicians would love to cut the funding for those.

author: Willy
content: This still smells of disaster with a pre-existing bandaid. Seems to me they need to practice the actual rescuing before building the ship. It may be great for finding treasure. Yet it may also be great at showing what works on paper has no value in reality.
